column10: Crosswalk signal turned red for cars, after approximately 4 seconds after lights turned red, two teens began crossing and jumped backwards onto curb to avoid a vehicle running red light.
Riding south on right side of road a mini Cooper passed within a foot or two of my shoulder into oncoming traffic

Witnessed drivers on Courthouse approaching the Nutley intersection in right turn lane (from the west) fail to stop on red at or behind the stop bar. Many roll through the sidewalk and complete a right turn on red without stopping at all. Intersection design does not allow drivers turning right visibility to approaching traffic, so drivers are unable to safely turn right without blocking the crosswalk.
